scripts.images:compress: find public/images -maxdepth 1 -type f \( -iname '*.png' -o -iname '*.jpg' -o -iname '*.jpeg' \) -print0 | while IFS= read -r -d '' file; do width=$(sips -g pixelWidth "$file" 2>/dev/null | awk '/pixelWidth:/{print $2}'); if [ "${width:-0}" -gt 1600 ]; then npx sharp -i "$file" -o public/images -f webp -q 78 -- resize 1600; else npx sharp -i "$file" -o public/images -f webp -q 78; fi; done
